name: goto_if_equal
description:
Remove the top two values on the stack, and if they are C `==`, set the
   instruction pointer to the value specified by _location_.
related:
goto
   goto_if_false
   goto_if_true
   goto_if_nil
   goto_if_not_nil
   goto_if_undefined
   goto_if_not_undefined
   goto_if_not_equal
